author.organization: National Institute of Information and Communications Technology

abstract.t: This document specifies the requirements of on-path telemetry for multicast traffic using In-situ OAM. While In-situ OAM is advantageous for multicast traffic telemetry, some unique challenges are present. This document provides the solutions based on the In- situ OAM trace option and direct export option to support the telemetry data correlation and the multicast tree reconstruction without incurring data redundancy.
